mapper.insert: insert into coursecommon(contentid,region, firstimage, firstimage2, overview, title, mapx, mapy,mlevel) values( #{contentid},#{region}, #{firstimage}, #{firstimage2}, #{overview}, #{title}, #{mapx}, #{mapy},#{mlevel})
update coursecommon set distance = #{distance}, taketime =#{taketime} where contentid = #{contentid}
insert into coursedetail( contentid, region,subdetailalt, subdetailimg, subdetailoverview, subname) values( #{contentid},#{region},#{subdetailalt}, #{subdetailimg}, #{subdetailoverview}, #{subname})
mapper.select: select contentid,region,subname, subdetailimg, subdetailoverview from coursedetail where region="서울";
